caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. GEORGE LAWRENCE CLEGG,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 951 MAL 2005. Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 31st AND NOW, this 31st day of May, 2006, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
